title: Android Axon.ivy Application
description: We are going to create a prototype of Android Axon.ivy app which focus on Lollipops animation to enhance user experience.

featureset.title: 1. Main screen
featureset.description:
• Load task list with curved motion
  • Refresh task list using SwipeRefreshLayout
  • Add/remove item with fade animation
  • Remove done task using swipe gesture
  • Create item layout using CardView which support ripples animation
  • Show done/edit marker with accent animation

featureset.title: 2. Settings screen
featureset.description: • Open and close settings screen using share elements trasition and activity transition.

featureset.title: 3. Task detail screen
featureset.description: • Open and close settings screen using share elements trasition and activity transition.
